entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Rigolet
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. Temperature falling to minus 15 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Blowing snow over exposed areas late this morning and this afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 this morning. Temperature falling to minus 15 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 4 this morning and minus 25 this afternoon. Forecast issued 06:00 AM NST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this evening then clearing. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 06:00 AM NST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:00 AM NST Tuesday 21 February 2023
